basic.description: This course examines the law, philosophy and practice of sentencing in Canada. Attention is paid to the procedural and evidentiary aspects of sentencing, sentencing options and specific sentencing issues (murder, dangerous offenders, young offenders, native offenders). (To be offered jointly with LAW-416.) Three term-hours; Fall. Instructor TBA.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Sentencing And Penal Policy
